title: How to Live with an Alcoholic and Survive
description: Do you have an alcoholic in your life who is destroying not only their own life, but yours as well? Are you frustrated with your ability to handle the situation well? Do you find yourself getting angry and making everything worse? Do you sometimes feel like just curling up in a ball and hiding from the world?If you answered "yes" to any of these questions, I think you might find some answers in this book, which has been written by someone who's been through it all and survived.This book will give you specific strategies to employ that will help you get your life back, regardless of what the alcoholic in your life chooses to do with his or hers.
author: Carol Mills
